entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 12:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: E 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 8. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
